content: When sending --print-map to the linker it will print info to stdout, but where does cargo (or rustc) actually make that stdout end up?
Unfortunately I think the linker output is discarded. I think you have to build rustc with debug logging to view it. Usually I just run with --print=link-args and run the linker manually.
The last time I needed it I had to set the environment variable RUSTC_LOG to rustc_codegen_ssa::back::link=info. Not sure if this has changed though.
